Reasoning Process: There are 40 students; 80% have puppies, so 0.80×40 = 32 students. Of those, 25% also have parrots, so 0.25×32 = 8 students.
Jonah burns 30 calories per hour. In 2 hours he burns 2×30 = 60 calories; in 5 hours he would burn 5×30 = 150 calories. The difference is 150 − 60 = 90 calories.
Mark reads 2 hours per day for 7 days, so 2×7 = 14 hours per week. He adds 4 hours weekly, giving 14 + 4 = 18 hours.
